entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
